channel.title: Heroku on Preslav Rachev
channel.description: Recent content in Heroku on Preslav Rachev

item.title: Deploying a Native Go Binary on Heroku
item.description: My company, KI labs recently held its first hackathon in our Munich office. My team and I went for a very cool mobile app idea that promotes healthy walking competitions among colleagues and friends. Though the app itself deserves a proper introduction, I will talk about it in a separate post. This time I will focus on one problem I experienced while working on the app’s backend part, written in Go.
